name: Kirby2
author: R​iceKirby
summary: I'm Meta Knight, and I'm tired of this peaceful Dream Land, so I will lead my army to take over it! Kirby will try to stop me, so I need all my Knights hitting him during the same night to weaken him enough for me to deal the finishing blow! When someone is voted they will not die, but instead reveal the weapon they are holding!

sides.winmsg: ±Meta Knight: Halberd, time to take off! ~Players~ shall take over Dream Land and make it a Meta Knight Army's possession!

variables.KirbyHelp: Hiii! I'm raiding the Halberd to stop Meta Knight and his evil plans! During the night, I can use /axe [name] to defeat a Mace Knight, /mace [name] to defeat a Sword Knight or /sword [name] to defeat an Ax Knight, but I can only use one of those per night. I can also attack myself to trick the Knights into thinking I was hit by Kirby.
variables.KirbyHelp2: I cannot be killed by Meta Knight unless I am hit by an Axe, a Mace and a Sword during a single night. Once I defeat enough of his minions, I can challenge Meta Knight directly!
variables.Kirby2Help: Hiii! I'm raiding the Halberd to stop Meta Knight and his evil plans! During the night, I can use /spear [name] to defeat a Trident Knight or /fork [name] to defeat a Javelin Knight, but I can only use one of those per night. I can also attack myself to trick the Knights into thinking I was hit by Kirby.
variables.Kirby2Help2: I cannot be killed by Meta Knight unless I am hit by a Spear and a Fork during a single night. Once I defeat enough of his minions, I can challenge Meta Knight directly!
variables.SwordKirbyHelp: I defeated enough minions, so now I can fight Meta Knight! By typing /kill [name] during the day, I can defeat an enemy without being revealed, but I need to be careful because Meta Knight can kill me now!
variables.mk_win_msg: Meta Knight (~Target~) has defeated Kirby! There's no one left to defend Dream Land now!

tips.Minions: Kirby becomes weakened for 1 turn if Javelin+Trident (small games) or Ax+Mace+Blade (large games) hit him during the same night.
tips.Meta Knight: You can only kill Kirby in 2 situations: If he's Weakened or once he becomes Sword Kirby. DO NOT randkill unless he's in one of those forms, and don't claim either so he cannot kill you if he become Sword Kirby.
tips.Kirby: Use your night attacks to slowly defeat Meta Knight's minions or to hit yourself to trick the Knights. Once you defeat all of the same type, you will become Sword Kirby and be able to kill Meta Knight.
tips.Voting: The voting phase in this theme is used to obtain information. Whoever is voted off is not killed, but instead reveals their weapon. Meta Knight reveals a random weapon (never changes during a game), while Kirby reveals the last weapon it used.
tips.Weapons: Each minion is weak to a specific weapon, no matter if it was used by Kirby or by another Knight. If hit by that weapon, the Knight dies, otherwise nothing happens.
tips.Confirming Kirby: If someone is voted off twice and show a different weapon each time, they are confirmed Kirby. This only works on turns that Kirby attacks with different weapons at night.
